keyMoments.title: Continues Battle with Rob Lucci
keyMoments.description: Luffy continues his intense battle with Rob Lucci at the Bridge of Hesitation while his crew waits on the escape ship.
keyMoments.significance: The climactic confrontation determining the fate of the entire rescue mission.
keyMoments.quote: I will not stop using my power until you are defeated!

keyMoments.title: Activates Gear Second Against Lucci
keyMoments.description: Luffy activates Gear Second for the second time in his battle against Lucci, steam rising from his body as his blood flow accelerates.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's determination to push his enhanced form to its limits against the strongest opponent he's faced.
keyMoments.quote: I will not stop using my power until you are defeated!

keyMoments.title: Uses Gomu Gomu no Jet Pistol
keyMoments.description: Using Gear Second's speed, Luffy unleashes Jet Pistol, blasting Lucci backward with tremendous force.
keyMoments.significance: First use of Jet Pistol in this fight, showing the enhanced offensive capabilities of Gear Second.

keyMoments.title: Uses Gomu Gomu no Jet Bullet
keyMoments.description: Luffy strikes Lucci in the stomach with Jet Bullet, demonstrating another powerful Gear Second technique.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's versatility in adapting multiple techniques to Gear Second's enhanced form.

abilities.description: A Gear Second-enhanced version of Gomu Gomu no Pistol, combining rubber elasticity with dramatically increased speed to deliver a devastating punch.
A Gear Second-enhanced concentrated strike to the opponent's body, utilizing the increased speed and power of the enhanced form.

keyMoments.title: Franky's Desperate Plea
keyMoments.description: Franky frantically yells for Luffy to hurry, his voice filled with anguish as he realizes their allies are in mortal danger.
keyMoments.significance: This emotional outburst gives the episode its title and shows Franky's deep concern for his family and the Galley-La workers.

keyMoments.title: Witnesses Allies' Apparent Death
keyMoments.description: Franky watches in horror as Oimo, Kashii, the Franky Family, and Galley-La members are blown into the waterfall by battleship cannon fire.
keyMoments.significance: A devastating moment that shows Franky's emotional vulnerability and his deep bonds with his family despite his tough cyborg exterior.

keyMoments.title: Continues Battle with Luffy
keyMoments.description: Lucci continues his intense battle with Luffy at the Bridge of Hesitation, demonstrating his incredible combat abilities.
keyMoments.significance: The climactic confrontation between the strongest CP9 agent and Luffy.

keyMoments.title: Prepares Ultimate Rokushiki Technique
keyMoments.description: After taking multiple Jet attacks from Luffy, Lucci declares he will demonstrate the most powerful Rokushiki technique.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the reveal of Rokuogan, the ultimate technique that only absolute masters of Rokushiki can access.
keyMoments.quote: I will show you the most powerful Rokushiki technique!

keyMoments.title: Trusts Luffy to Handle Lucci Alone
keyMoments.description: Zoro dismisses the idea of helping Luffy fight Lucci, stating it is best not to get involved and showing complete trust in their captain's abilities.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's growth and maturity in understanding their roles and trusting Luffy to overcome any obstacle.
keyMoments.quote: It is best not to get involved.

keyMoments.title: Attacked by Battleships
keyMoments.description: Oimo and Kashii are attacked by three Buster Call battleships while carrying the Franky Family and Galley-La workers to safety.
keyMoments.significance: The giants heroically shield their smaller allies from the devastating cannon fire.

keyMoments.title: Takes Cannon Fire to Protect Allies
keyMoments.description: Oimo takes the brunt of the battleship bombardment to protect everyone he's carrying, then falls into the waterfall.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the giant's incredible loyalty and willingness to sacrifice himself for his newfound allies.

keyMoments.title: Attacked by Battleships
keyMoments.description: Kashii and Oimo are attacked by three Buster Call battleships while carrying the Franky Family and Galley-La workers to safety.
keyMoments.significance: The giants heroically shield their smaller allies from the devastating cannon fire.

keyMoments.title: Takes Cannon Fire to Protect Allies
keyMoments.description: Kashii takes the brunt of the battleship bombardment to protect everyone he's carrying, then falls into the waterfall.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the giant's incredible loyalty and willingness to sacrifice himself for his newfound allies.

keyMoments.title: Under Attack from Battleships
keyMoments.description: Paulie is among those being carried by Oimo and Kashii when they come under attack from Buster Call battleships.
keyMoments.significance: Part of the group of allies who appear to die in the bombardment.
